entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Victoria (University of)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: University of Victoria 5:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
